CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Horde to run this profile
If the bot takes more than 10 seconds to move, it is compiling quests to see where you are - it's about 1 minute per zone completed

CustomBehavior.Lua: i=GetQuestLogIndexByID(11664) a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,j=GetQuestLogTitle(i) if g==-1 then SelectQuestLogEntry(i) SetAbandonQuest(i) AbandonQuest(i) end
